news_header: Cottage sales in Finland have returned to 2022 levels, with stable prices and increased activity in residential housing trade.
news_text: The Real Estate Association reports that the number of cottage sales has rebounded to 2022 levels, with approximately 2,350 holiday homes sold during the summer season. The prices of cottages have remained consistent with previous years. Most sales were of used vacation homes, particularly in South-Savo and North Savo, where only 10 new homes were sold. Additionally, there was an increase in sales in Uusimaa, Pirkanmaa, and Southwest Finland from May to September.
